text: Yuri Anatolievich Poteyenko (, born December 5, 1960Yuri Poteyenko at kino- teatr.ruYuri Poteyenko at film.ru) is a Russian film composer. Four times the winner of the Golden Eagle Award for the best film music (2010, 2013, 2016, 2018).Стали известны лауреаты премии «Золотой орел – 2018» ==Selected filmography== * Night Watch (2004) * Popsa (2005) * Day Watch (2006) * The Russian Game (2007) * The Irony of Fate 2 (2007) * The Inhabited Island (2009) * The Inhabited Island. Skirmish (2009) * Spy (2012) * White Tiger (2013) * Metro (2013) *Devil's Pass (2013) * Battalion (2015) * The Age of PioneersСтали известны лауреаты премии «Золотой орёл» (2017) * Anna Karenina: Vronsky's Story (2017) * Saving Leningrad (2019) * Goalkeeper of the Galaxy (2019) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960 births Category:People from Luhansk Oblast Category:Living people Category:Russian composers Category:Russian male composers Category:Moscow Conservatory alumni Category:Soviet film score composers Category:Russian film score composers Category:Russian music educators Category:Moscow Conservatory faculty Category:20th-century male musicians
title: Yuri Poteyenko
